_comment: This is a code comment. This data is sourced by the use-navigation hook and used in the SSR page
title: SSR - Serverless Function - SSG
body: The SSR and Serverless Function share the same node util that requests data from FaunaDB and reduces it on the server. The SSG page data is saved in a .json file and is also used to populate the navigation and contains a slug, title and Svg icon path (it mimics the shape of the others pages which use MDX Frontmatter)
